page.title: 02OSBORNE HOUSE
page.content: Mr. and Mrs Roberts live in{Osborne {House.}The house was built in{1916} and was originally a 'two up two down', but an extension was added in 1973. The house is one of twelve houses in {Bedfordshire}which has a{bore hole} because it is not connected to the mains water supply. Neither is it connected to the main sewage pipe. Osborne House was named after the previous owner{John Osborne Wagstaff. Mr. and Mrs Roberts are running a smallholding at Osborne House. It consists of{chickens}for their eggs, {sheep}for their wool, and {tomatoes. { }This is not Mr. Roberts main job, he works for B.P. in Hemel Hempstead. { }
